fields.text: You are about to recall all cards. Are you sure?

info.name: Dog Eat Dog World
info.attribution:

Library image generated using the Midjourney artificial intelligence image generator, https://www.midjourney.com/home/, using the following prompt: "food chain mammals watercolor painting --ar 1:1 --v 5.1"
info.description: Starting with grid of 16 cards representing animals, move card to eat another smaller, adjacent animal card. Then activate the special power of the eating animal. Game ends when player cannot move to eat an animal. Goal is to have only one animal card remaining.

6.power: After eating, move this animal to any other space.

8.power: On next turn, if eat animal exactly 1 below, discard any 1 unstacked animal.

9.power: On next turn, animal must move diagonally 1 space to eat.

10.power: On next turn, animal must jump over 1 card orthogonally to eat.

11.power: After eating, move this animal 1 space.

12.power: On next turn, animal must move 2 spaces to eat.

13.power: On next turn, move eaten animal to predator's space & place on bottom of stack.

14.power: On next turn, animal must eat animal valued exactly 1 less.

15.power: On next turn, cannot use this animal to eat.

Whale.power: Move 1 animal to any other space.

Shark.power: Move animal 1 space to eat. Can eat animal of ANY smaller value.

fields.text: You are about to recall all cards and deal them into the default grid pattern. Are you sure?

loopRoutine: var xDiff = abs ${PROPERTY x OF floor}
var yDiff = abs ${PROPERTY y OF floor}

fields.text: You are about to recall all cards and deal them into one of 6 randomly selected, pre-defined patterns. Are you sure?

Ray.power: Prevent next predator's ability from activating.

Octopus.power: Discard unstacked animal and activate its ability.

Dolphin.power: Move animal 1 space to eat. Place the predator below the prey.

Whale2.power: Move 1 animal to any other space.

Shark2.power: Move animal 1 space to eat. Can eat animal of ANY smaller value.

Eagle.power: Use only if <10 animals. Shuffle 3 adjacent animals in row or column. Return.

Owl.power: Shuffle stack of >2 animals. Randomly draw 1 and return it. Discard others.

Buzzard.power: Next 3 predators must have odd numbers.

fields.label: If so, use how many water animals?
If so, use how many flying animals?
